mapper.select: select p.id,p.user_id,u.nickname,p.content,p.createtime,p.flag from f_post p left join f_user u on p.user_id=u.id
select p.id,p.user_id,u.nickname,p.content,p.createtime,p.flag from f_post p left join f_user u on p.user_id=u.id where u.username like #{keyword} or p.content like #{keyword}
mapper.update: update f_post set flag=0 where id=#{id}
update f_post set flag=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id,user_id,content from f_post where flag=1 and content like #{keyword}
